moves.1. e4: Hello everyone welcome to new annotation this is a short game.But i hope it helps someone and possibly help me.Okay here we go.He opens with e4
moves.2. Qh5: WAY to early to bring out the Queen.
moves.2... Nf6: Nf6 to put pressure on early queen and e4
moves.3. Qxe5+: This move does gain pawn and does put me in check but with so little development it is uneffectual
moves.4. Bc4: I believe he trying to develop and put pressure on kingside.Not sure??????
moves.6. Bd3: Negative move i believe continuing to stunt development
moves.8. e5: Here i believe e5 is used as bait so i will lose N if i went Nxe6 therefore destroying my center .Because i believe he would have went Qxe5 thus forcing move of Nf6 so i just went d6xe5
moves.9. Ng5: Now i see his plan?I think now he is trying to move in on my kingside
moves.11. Bxh7+: Iwas wrong about trade or he was focusing in on one part of board i unfornately have done this lost games as result
moves.11... Kh8: He should have took queen next.h7 was cover by his knight and mine,but he would have sacked his queen
moves.12. Bg6+: This always happens when you forget about "rifle" in longshot and you charge in without looking around
moves.12... Qxh4: After this move opponent resigns i  was about to take Bg6 or Ng5.I hope you enjoyed.postive input taken negative tolerated GOOD CHESS GOOD DAY!!!
